name: Lao Papaya Salad Recipe (Thum Mak Hoong)
description: This Lao papaya salad recipe for thum mak hoong is quick, easy, and foolproof! Serve with sticky rice and a side of grilled meats.

recipeInstructions.text: Pound garlic and chilies with a mortar and pestle.
recipeInstructions.name: Pound garlic and chilies with a mortar and pestle.

recipeInstructions.text: Pound in the shrimp paste, palm sugar, and MSG.
recipeInstructions.name: Pound in the shrimp paste, palm sugar, and MSG.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the dressing sauces: fish sauce, fermented fish sauce, lime juice, and tamarind paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the dressing sauces: fish sauce, fermented fish sauce, lime juice, and tamarind paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss in sliced yard-long beans and shredded green papaya. Pound to mix and lightly bruise the beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss in sliced yard-long beans and shredded green papaya. Pound to mix and lightly bruise the beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Lastly, add sliced tomatoes and mix everything one last time. Serve immediately with sticky rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Lastly, add sliced tomatoes and mix everything one last time. Serve immediately with sticky rice.

review.reviewBody: I love this one! Very healthy and tasteful!

keywords: lao papaya salad, spicy lao salad, thum mak hoong
